EmailTemplate.subject: Get Your Workloads To Manage Themselves
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Turbonomic <[[https://www.turbonomic.com/]]> can lower your cloud cost while simultaneously assuring application performance. We have helped 2000+ customers and over 100 of the Fortune 500 to save time and enable innovation. When you get time back to innovate, your business wins.
Check outÂ this video to learn how our customers are changing the way they manage cloud infrastructure and operations by letting software make real-time workload decisions all day, every day.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/videos/the-smart-workload-v3]]>
Watch some of our Customer Videos <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/customer-videos]]> to find out how more of our customers are enabling their organizations to innovate.
Regards, Elizabeth
